So these are the

889.87.text:
people to view

894.90.text:
one of the most dangerous

that there is-- as something

Of all the chapters, it was

907.90.text:
It was really distressing

910.88.text:
We're often talking about

915.66.text:
are extremely depressed, are

920.90.text:
and suffering

922.32.text:
And it's a very similar

927.84.text:

931.31.text:

933.55.text:

936.73.text:

956.11.text:
People that commit

971.22.text:

992.10.text:

how you're feeling, was

Every time we talked

we got on very,

1258.82.text:
to work out precisely
